passages.text:
You open your eyes, you can hear rooster crows in the distance. You're comfortably resting in your bed. The sun is peaking through, illuminating your room. 

[[Get out of bed]] 
[[Fall back asleep]]
passages.name: Family cottage

passages.text:
You decide it's time to get up. You slip on some comfortable clothes. Your stomach is growling. 
[[Walk into kitchen]]
[[Leave through window]]
passages.name: Get out of bed

passages.text:
You decide it's to early to get up. Besides, who even wakes up at this time? You attempt to fall back asleep. However before you fall back asleep, your mother bangs on the door and demand you get up.
[[Get out of bed]]
passages.name: Fall back asleep

passages.text:
You walk into the kitchen, your mother is at the stove cleaning up. "Good morning son, breakfast's on the table. Your father's already outside working the field." You sit at the table and eat your breakfast, sunny side up eggs, lightly salted. With a side of beef sausage. Afterwords you thank your mother and walk outside the front door. 
[[Walk through Village]]
[[Go back inside]]
passages.name: Walk into kitchen

passages.text:
You're upset you couldn't go back to sleep. You ignore your stomach and decide to get a jump start on your day. 
[[Walk through Village]]
passages.name: Leave through window

passages.text:
Walking along the the dirt road of your village you spot some neighbors and greet them. "Good morning" they reply. A row of similar looking straw thatched houses line the street you walk down. 
[[Village square]]
passages.name: Walk through Village

passages.text:
You walk back inside your family cottage. Your mother has finished cleaning up and is getting ready to go out. "Did you need something?
[[Walk through Village]]
passages.name: Go back inside

passages.text:
You reach the village square. You rest on the rim of a large fountain in the center. The mayoral manor, soldier barracks, announcement board, and merchant stalls surround the square. In the distance are familiar fields.
[[Mayoral manor]]
[[Soldier barracks]]
[[Announcement board]]
[[Merchant stalls]]
[[Head towards the fields]]
passages.name: Village square

passages.text:
You decide you've seen enough of your village and head along the dirt path leading towards the fields. Along the way you see your father in the fields near your home and wave, your siblings are with him. You come to a fork in the road. 
[[Continue onto main road]]
[[Break from path]]
passages.name: Head towards the fields

passages.text:
Approaching the manor, a large iron gate stands before you. A posted guard greets you "Hello there lad, sorry, but the mayors busy today. Trying to come up with a plan to deal with the recent trouble." 
[[Village square]]
passages.name: Mayoral manor

passages.text:
Approaching the barracks, you see a guard sitting down yawning. He's probably been there all night. "Sorry kid, can't let you any farther. You know the rules. Besides, we don't have time for a tour or anything today. Something big coming."
[[Village square]]
passages.name: Soldier barracks

passages.text:
Posted by order of mayor Nicholas 
Warning: There have been reports of goblin sightings in the woods by hunters. Exercise extreme caution when traveling the outskirts. 
Recruitment: We're in need of more village guards, visit the local garrison barracks to inquire. 
[[Village square]]
passages.name: Announcement board

passages.text:
You leave your comfortable position atop the village square's fountain rim. As you approach the shopping district section of the square. You see a wide array of carts in rows, proclaiming their foods to passerbys. 
[[Village square]]
passages.name: Merchant stalls

passages.text: Double-click this passage to edit it.
passages.name: Continue onto main road

passages.text: Double-click this passage to edit it.
passages.name: Break from path
